pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Rev. Park Huntington Radio Broadcast Recordings
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Collection of recordings made by Rev. Park W. Huntington and broadcast by station WDEL of Wilmington, DE from 1954 to 1961.  Contains tape recordings of progam "This is the Hour." Huntington was a pastor of St. Stephen's Lutheran Church in Wilmington, and served as regiment chaplain of the 198th Anti-Aircraft Regiment of the Delaware National Guard during WWII.
